sentences.en: Intersperse exclamation marks in the text.
sentences.cn: 在文章中加进一些感叹号.

sentences.en: Originally the intention was to intersperse the historical scenes with modern ones.
sentences.cn: 最初是想用现代景观点缀历史景观。

sentences.en: Taking advantage of abstract line, brilliant color and high - sounding intersperse reveals luxurious feature.
sentences.cn: 抽象的线条, 大胆的颜色和夸张的点缀尽显致奢华.

sentences.en: You should intersperse colorful anecdotes about your experience with perceptive queries about the vacancy.
sentences.cn: 讲述自己的经历时应该加入一些有声有色的轶事,中间巧妙穿插对所应聘职位的询问.

trans.tran_en: if something is interspersed with a particular kind of thing, it has a lot of them in it
